$description: D&D 5e 2024 racial/species traits. Associated with races via race field.

data.name: Celestial Resistance
data.description: You have Resistance to Necrotic damage and Radiant damage.

data.name: Darkvision
data.description: You can see in dim light within the range as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light.

data.name: Healing Hands
data.description: As a Magic action, you can touch a creature and roll a number of d4s equal to your Proficiency Bonus. The creature regains Hit Points equal to the total rolled.

data.name: Light Bearer
data.description: You know the Light cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

data.name: Celestial Revelation
data.description: At level 3, you gain a transformation based on your Aasimar subtype.

data.name: Heavenly Wings
data.description: You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed and can deal extra Radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus once per turn.

data.name: Inner Radiance
data.description: You shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and deal Radiant damage to creatures within it.

data.name: Necrotic Shroud
data.description: You can frighten nearby creatures and deal extra Necrotic damage once per turn.

data.name: Draconic Ancestry
data.description: You have a dragon ancestor, which determines your damage type for Breath Weapon and Damage Resistance.

data.name: Breath Weapon
data.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with a 15-foot cone or 30-foot line of elemental energy. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

data.name: Damage Resistance
data.description: You have Resistance to the damage type associated with your Draconic Ancestry.

data.name: Draconic Flight
data.description: At level 5, you can sprout spectral wings that give you a Fly speed for 10 minutes, usable once per Long Rest.

data.name: Dwarven Resilience
data.description: You have Advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have Resistance to Poison damage.

data.name: Dwarven Toughness
data.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

data.name: Stonecunning
data.description: As a Bonus Action, you gain Tremorsense with a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes while on stone surfaces.

data.name: Fey Ancestry
data.description: You have Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

data.name: Trance
data.description: You don't need to sleep. Instead, you enter a trance for 4 hours equal to a Long Rest.

data.name: Keen Senses
data.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

data.name: Drow Lineage
data.description: At 1st level, you know Dancing Lights. At 3rd level, Faerie Fire. At 5th level, Darkness. Charisma is your spellcasting ability. You also have superior Darkvision (120 ft).

data.name: High Elf Lineage
data.description: You know one Wizard cantrip using Intelligence. At 3rd level, gain Detect Magic. At 5th level, Misty Step.

data.name: Wood Elf Lineage
data.description: Your walking speed is 35 feet. You know Druidcraft. At 3rd level, Longstrider. At 5th level, Pass Without Trace.

data.name: Gnomish Cunning
data.description: You have Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

data.name: Gnomish Lineage (Forest)
data.description: You know Minor Illusion. You can communicate with Small beasts.

data.name: Gnomish Lineage (Rock)
data.description: You know Prestidigitation and Mending. You can create Tiny clockwork devices.

data.name: Giant Ancestry
data.description: You trace your lineage to a type of giant, which grants you a supernatural ability.

data.name: Large Form
data.description: At level 5, as a Bonus Action, you can become Large for 10 minutes. Advantage on Strength checks and deal extra damage.

data.name: Powerful Build
data.description: You have Advantage on saving throws to end the Grappled condition. You count as one size larger for carrying capacity.

data.name: Cloud's Jaunt
data.description: As a Bonus Action, you can teleport up to 30 feet. Proficiency Bonus uses per Long Rest.

data.name: Fire's Burn
data.description: When you hit with an attack, you deal extra Fire damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

data.name: Frost's Chill
data.description: When you hit, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

data.name: Hill's Tumble
data.description: When you hit a Large or smaller creature, you can knock it Prone.

data.name: Stone's Endurance
data.description: As a Reaction when you take damage, you can roll 1d12 + Constitution modifier and reduce the damage by that amount.

data.name: Storm's Thunder
data.description: When a creature within 60 feet hits you, you can use your Reaction to deal Thunder damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

data.name: Brave
data.description: You have Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Frightened condition.

data.name: Halfling Nimbleness
data.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than you.

data.name: Luck
data.description: When you roll a 1 on a d20 for a d20 Test, you can reroll the die, and you must use the new roll.

data.name: Naturally Stealthy
data.description: You can hide behind creatures that are a size larger than you. You have proficiency in the Stealth skill.

data.name: Resourceful
data.description: You gain Heroic Inspiration whenever you finish a Long Rest.

data.name: Skillful
data.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

data.name: Versatile
data.description: You gain an Origin Feat of your choice.

data.name: Adrenaline Rush
data.description: As a Bonus Action, you can take the Dash action and gain Temporary HP equal to your level. Proficiency Bonus uses per Long Rest.

data.name: Relentless Endurance
data.description: When you are reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 HP instead. Once per Long Rest.

data.name: Fiendish Legacy
data.description: You know a cantrip, and at levels 3 and 5 you learn additional spells based on your legacy. Charisma is your spellcasting ability.

data.name: Otherworldly Presence
data.description: You have proficiency in the Intimidation or Persuasion skill.

data.name: Poison Resistance
data.description: You have Resistance to Poison damage.

data.name: Necrotic Resistance
data.description: You have Resistance to Necrotic damage.

data.name: Fire Resistance
data.description: You have Resistance to Fire damage.
